A comment entered when you save your map: A comment entered when you save your mapping to the OSM database. When saving your work, please leave the default comment but add what you actually mapped, for example: Added buildings and a residential road.

Anyone who can use a computer to draw li: Jeder der einen Computer zum Zeichnen von Linien benutzen oder auf seinem Smartphone wischen und tippen kann, kann bedeutsam zum humanitären Mapping beitragen. Wenn Du bislang noch nicht gemappt hast und helfen möchtest, Luftbilder zu digitalisieren und Gebäude sowie Straßen zu markieren, bitten wir Dich, unsere Learn-Seite zu besuchen, welche Dich in weniger als 30 Minuten zum Mappen bringt.

Default comments added to uploaded chang: Default comments added to uploaded changeset comment field. Users should also be encouraged to add text describing what they mapped. Example: #hotosm-project-470 #missingmaps Buildings mapping. Hashtags are sometimes used for analysis later, but should be human informative and not overused, #group #event for example.
Zeichne das Arbeitsgebiet (AOI) in die Karte.
During disaster preparation, response an: During disaster preparation, response and recovery, detailed geospatial information, maps of roads, buildings, bridges, etc., is critical to delivering the best service and support in the most timely and efficient way possible. Unfortunately, this kind of information does not exist or is not open and accessible for large parts of the world. Through coordinated, remote satellite or UAV imagery based mapping and a close working partnership with people on the ground you can help provide that data where and when it is needed.

Fork the Tasking Manager Code on GitHub: Fork the Tasking Manager Code on GitHub
If checked, only users with the listed m: If checked, only users with the listed mapper experience level will be able to contribute to this project. If unchecked, anyone can contribute. Go to the Metadata panel to change the mapper experience level for this project.
If checked, only users with the Validato: If checked, only users with the Validator role will be able to validate tasks in this project. If unchecked, anyone can validate or invalidate tasks.
If you are returning and ready to start: If you are returning and ready to start mapping, please visit the Contribute page. You will see a list of mapping projects that need someone just like you to help get them done. You can select the Filter tab and narrow down the projects that you most want to work on. Your profile page has a list and quick link to projects you have already taken part in.
If you want mappers to work on the highe: If you want mappers to work on the highest priority areas first, draw one of more polygons within the project area.
Import a GeoJSON, KML, or zipped SHP fil: Import a GeoJSON, KML, or zipped SHP file.
In order to make full use of the many fe: Um alle Möglichkeiten des Tasking Managers zu nutzen, benutze bitte einen PC oder Laptop. Wenn Du auf einem mobilen Gerät mitarbeiten möchtest, nutze bitte MapSwipe.
Invalidating all the tasks failed for an: Invalidating all the tasks failed for an unknown reason.
It is recommended to keep the size of th: It is recommended to keep the size of the tasks small. Please review the size of the tasks and/or consider creating multiple projects.
It is very easy to get started mapping i: It is very easy to get started mapping in OpenStreetMap and contribute to HOT projects. People around the world rely on OpenStreetMap data contributed by millions of people over the past 10 years. While it is easy to get started, it does take some effort and practice to do well. If this is your first time mapping, please take about 30 mins to watch the video (in English with multi-language subtitles) to learn the basics of how to map using the OSM web browser based editor called iD. Please, now and in the future, always focus on quality, not quantity of mapping you do.
JOSM remote control did not respond. Do: JOSM remote control antwortete nicht. Hast Du JOSM gestartet und so konfiguriert, dass es ferngesteuert werden kann?
Manually set the experience level of a u: Manually set the experience level of a user.
Maximum number of tasks reached. If smal: Maximale Aufgaben-Zahl erreicht. Wenn kleinere Aufgaben benötigt werden, verkleinere bitte das Arbeitsgebiet (AOI).
Metadata and tags are used to allow user: Metadata and tags are used to allow users to find projects to work on and group projects.

Private means that only the given list o: Private means that only the given list of users below can access this project. In order for the users name to be available to add to the Allowed Users list - they first must visit the URL for this installation of OSM Tasking Manager and Authorize access to their OpenStreetMap account. After they have done this, their username will be available for the Project Manager to add.

The OSM Tasking Manager is a mapping too: The OSM Tasking Manager is a mapping tool designed and built for the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team's collaborative mapping process. The purpose of the tool is to divide up a mapping project into smaller tasks that can be completed rapidly with many people working on the same overall area. It shows which areas need to be mapped and which areas need the mapping validated.
The OSM Tasking Manager is Open Source s: Die OSM Tasking Manager Software ist Open Source. Du bist willkommen, an ihr mitzuarbeiten und Probleme zu melden.
The OSM Tasking Manager was designed and: The OSM Tasking Manager was designed and built for the
The Project could not be created. This m: The Project could not be created. This may be because the combined data size of the AOI and the grid is too large to send to the server. Try again with a smaller AOI or fewer tasks.
The Project could not be trimmed. This m: The Project could not be trimmed. This may be because the combined data size of the AOI and the grid is too large to send to the server. Try again with a smaller AOI or fewer tasks.
The project was not deleted successfully: The project was not deleted successfully. This project might have some contributions.

This approach allows the distribution of: Dieses Vorgehen erlaubt die Verteilung von Aufgaben an viele einzelne Mapper im Rahmen von Katastrophen oder andern humanitären Mapping-Einsätzen. Es erlaubt auch den Projekt-Fortschritt darzustellen und es hilft die Konsistenz des Mappings zu verbessern (z. B.: Element-Auswahl, besondere Tags, etc.).
This message is not translated to the se: This message is not translated to the selected language of the user, so you may want to include your own translations.
This task is available for mapping.
This task is available for validation.
This will mark all tasks (except bad ima: This will mark all tasks (except bad imagery) as valid. Please use this only if you are sure of what you are doing.
This will mark all tasks (except non com: This will mark all tasks (except non completed and bad imagery tasks) as invalid. Please use this only if you are sure of what you are doing.
This will send a Tasking Manager message: This will send a Tasking Manager message to every contributor of the current project. Please use this feature carefully.
Trim the task grid to the Area of Intere: Trim the task grid to the Area of Interest (optional). You can keep task squares complete, or clip them to the AOI. This could take some time.
Unable to create project because there a: Unable to create project because there are more than
Use this if for some reason you need to: Use this if for some reason you need to validate or invalidate all tasks in this project in a single step.
Validation is a second set of eyes revie: Die Validierung ist ein zweiter Blick, der das erste Mapping prüft. Sie wird gewöhnlich von erfahrenden OSM Mappern gemacht und beinhaltet ein Prüfung auf Vollständigkeit (was jeder machen kann) und die Nutzung verschiedener Tools, um die Daten auf technische Fehler (z. B. Gebäudewände als Straßenelemente) zu prüfen. Dieses Video (Englisch mit mehrsprachigen Untertiteln) zeigt Dir die Grundlagen des Validierens bei HOT Projekten.
View the projects that you have created: View the projects that you have created
Want to use an .osm file instead? You ca: Möchtest Du stattdessen eine .osm Datei verwenden? Du kannst verwenden
You cannot select tasks for mapping beca: You cannot select tasks for mapping because you already have one or more tasks locked. Use the map to re-select that task and complete it or stop mapping it.
You cannot select tasks for mapping on t: You cannot select tasks for mapping on this project because you do not have the required mapper experience level.
You cannot select tasks for validation o: You cannot select tasks for validation on this project because you do not have the Validator role.
You can only delete projects with no con: You can only delete projects with no contributions.
You can use Markdown. (HTML is not allow: You can use Markdown. (HTML is not allowed)
You do not have the required Validator r: Du hast nicht die benötigte Validator Rolle für die Überprüfung bei diesem Projekt.
You need to accept the license before co: You need to accept the license before continuing.
You need to add at least one allowed use: You need to add at least one allowed user to a private project.
